header.topics: Having a personal shopper; preparing for a marriage event in a church; roots -where these two ladies came from; description of the personal shopping experience and result; colours that suit; shoes and styles of shoes; dress accessories
header.activity: The experience of having a personal shopper
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, advising, anecdote telling, making arrangements

body.u: just to make sure this is I think that's okay it's recording okay so you were going to tell us about your experience of personal shopping
yes well the reason for personal shopping was because my daughter's getting married in December
mm
and erm wanted an outfit as the mother of the bride but I really don't want to stand out in front of anyone else I I don't don't I just hate that sort of thing
yes

and and I'm not happy with my weight cos I haven't been able to get onto the diet thing you know every Monday comes and I start and by Tuesday Wednesday it's off so wasn't really happy and I've gone up definitely a dress and a half size so eh this is she arranged for a personal shopping experience for herself myself and who is my my step erm

yes yes

so I wore a shift dress and that's what I'm happiest in is a shift dress of any kind black sequin evening whatever erm so she said black hmm and I said well I can dress it up with a lovely necklace or whatever er and a little coat or something like a jacket but my favourite would be black anyway she went away and she duly brought a little black dress which was the first thing to try on and there were other colours erm a bright a teal blue which in fact suited me I never knew it would do or never thought it would do but it did but it was just like a carnival dress it just was not me so ah but the black dress was an instant fit I just she just had my figure straight away and I thought I've never look so good in a black dress ah anyway but she said no no you can't do that for mother of the bride that's a no no so erm that was put aside and I said but I'll buy it as my little black dress so it was put aside for me it was the first one I tried that she brought in erm then another
